QuestData.Title: Elemental Energy
QuestData.Description: It's taking every ounce of our power to keep this realm stable in the absence of the World Pillar.$B$BAs shaman we can tap directly into the energies of the elementals that inhabit Deepholm and use them to heal the damage that the rift is causing.$B$BTake this totem and place it on the ground outside. Any energized geodes or lodestone elementals destroyed in its proximity will fill it with the energy we require.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 8 Energized Geodes or Lodestone Elementals near the Depleted Totem.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. We need all the power we can muster to keep Deepholm stable.
